issue.title: [Python] Remove any APIs deprecated prior to 0.14.x
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6125](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6125). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
A number of deprecated APIs, like `pyarrow.open_stream`, are still available
